summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding financial wire transfers related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial. It includes details about the amounts being transferred and the involved banking institutions.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is the sender of the email, requesting confirmation of the receipt of funds.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe is addressed in the email and is requested to confirm the receipt of funds.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda is copied on the email correspondence.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne is also copied on the email correspondence.

persons.name: Janet E. Young
persons.context: Janet is the sender of the forwarded message detailing the wire transfers.

connections.description: Harry is requesting confirmation from Vahe regarding the financial transactions.
Janet is providing Harry with information about the wire transfers.

keyFacts: Harry is requesting confirmation of wire transfers related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial.
The wire for Southern Trust has been released for an amount of $911,807.66.
A wire for Southern Financial is being processed for an amount of $10,397,099.07.
Janet E. Young is a Vice President at J.P. Morgan Private Bank.
The document contains confidential information as per Federal Rules.
